name: Sausage and Cream Cheese Pinwheels
author: brandi03
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened - divided
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes; drain and discard grease
Spread dough from 1 package of crescent rolls out onto a work surface and pinch perforations together to create a single sheet of dough
Spread half the cream cheese over the dough sheet, leaving a 1/2-inch margin all around
Sprinkle half the cooked sausage evenly over cream cheese
Roll dough up into a log, starting at a long edge; wrap log in plastic wrap or parchment paper
Repeat steps to make a second roll; wrap
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Unwrap rolls and cut each into 1/2-inch thick slices
Place slices onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until pinwheels are golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes
